title: List of people in alternative medicine - Wikipedia
cleaned_text: List of people in alternative medicine This article needs additional citations for |This article is part of |[Alternative medicine](/wiki/Alternative_medicine) This is a list of people in alternative medicine who are notable for developing, founding, inventing, promoting, practicing, marketing, commentating or researching on alternative medicine. A[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=1)] [Albert Abrams](/wiki/Albert_Abrams)- inventor of Electronic dynomizer, oscilloclast and radioclast. [F. Matthias Alexander](/wiki/F._Matthias_Alexander)- Technique](/wiki/Alexander_Technique), a movement retraining process. [C. A. Ansar](/wiki/C._A._Ansar)- medical practitioner [Guillermo Arévalo Valera](/wiki/Guillermo_Ar%C3%A9valo_Valera)- Shipibo writer, medicine B[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=2)] [Edward Bach](/wiki/Edward_Bach)- Founder of flower essence therapy and the Bach flower remedies. [William Horatio Bates](/wiki/William_Horatio_Bates)- Founder of the [Bates Method](/wiki/Bates_Method)alternative approach to eyesight improvement. [Henry G. Bieler](/wiki/Henry_G._Bieler)- American physician and author of Food is Your Best Medicine, known for diet-based healing and treatment of [Hollywood](/wiki/Hollywood_(film_industry))celebrities. [Ty Bollinger](/wiki/Ty_Bollinger)- Co-founder of The Truth About Cancer, promoter of ineffective cancer cures. [Paul Bragg](/wiki/Paul_Bragg)- Known for the Bragg Health Crusades, the Bragg Healthy Lifestyle, deep breathing, water fasts, organic foods, juicing and listening to one's body. C[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=3)] [Charaka](/wiki/Charaka)- One the founders of [Ayurveda](/wiki/Ayurveda). [Deepak Chopra](/wiki/Deepak_Chopra)- Endocrinologist and Ayurvedic Medicine Practitioner, author of popular books on health and spirituality. [Nicholas Culpeper](/wiki/Nicholas_Culpeper)- English physician, author of the early seventeenth century Culpeper's Herbal. E[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=4)] [Mary Baker Eddy](/wiki/Mary_Baker_Eddy)- field of Myomassology. [[1]](#cite_note-1) [Sylvester Graham](/wiki/Sylvester_Graham)- Known for Graham Crackers and founded Grahamism. [Stanislav Grof](/wiki/Stanislav_Grof)- One of the founders of the field of transpersonal psychology and founder beliefs and practices from all over the world into a system now known as [neoshamanism](/wiki/Neoshamanism). [Gustav Hemwall](/wiki/Gustav_Hemwall)- silver](/wiki/Medical_uses_of_silver#Colloidal_silver), which his skin a blue-gray color. [Adolf Just](/wiki/Adolf_Just)- Late 19th/Early 20th century German "Nature Cure" movement. K[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=9)] [John Harvey Kellogg](/wiki/John_Harvey_Kellogg)- Creek Sanatorium](/wiki/Battle_Creek_Sanatorium)in [Battle Creek, Michigan](/wiki/Battle_Creek,_Michigan). [Will Keith Kellogg](/wiki/Will_Keith_Kellogg)- Inventor of corn flakes in 1894 and manager of the Battle Creek Sanitarium. [Sebastian Kneipp](/wiki/Sebastian_Kneipp)- Bavarian priest who began the Nature Cure movement (1890s). Chiefly known for his contributions to [hydrotherapy](/wiki/Hydrotherapy). [Louis Kuhne](/wiki/Louis_Kuhne)- Promoter of L[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=10)] [George Lewith](/wiki/George_Lewith)- UK advocate for and professor at [Southampton University](/wiki/Southampton_University). [Pehr Henrik Ling](/wiki/Pehr_Henrik_Ling)- Swedish pioneer of physical education. Falsely credited as the Father of [Swedish Massage](/wiki/Massage#Swedish_massage)(that credit goes of [naturopathic medicine](/wiki/Naturopathic_medicine)in the United States. Purchased the rights to the term " [naturopathy](/wiki/Naturopathy)" from John Scheel. M[ J. Son of D.D. Palmer and known as the "developer" of [chiropractic](/wiki/Chiropractic). [Linus Pauling](/wiki/Linus_Pauling)- Coined the term " of [Vitamin C](/wiki/Vitamin_C)and other [megavitamin therapies](/wiki/Megavitamin_therapy). Pauling was however not a general supporter of medicine. [Fritz Perls](/wiki/Fritz_Perls)- Founder of [Gestalt Therapy](/wiki/Gestalt_Therapy). [Rolfing Structural Integration](/wiki/Rolfing), the that attempted to change posture. S[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=16)] [Charlotte Selver](/wiki/Charlotte_Selver)- Introduced the concept of sensory awareness for movement education and healing, which influenced many health disciplines during the [Human Potential Movement](/wiki/Human_Potential_Movement). [Herbert Shelton](/wiki/Herbert_Shelton)- Founded the [Natural Hygiene](/wiki/Orthopathy)movement. [Bernie Siegel](/wiki/Bernie_Siegel)- American MD and author who promotes cultivating one's attitude toward healing. [Rudolf Steiner](/wiki/Rudolf_Steiner)- Founded [anthroposophical medicine](/wiki/Anthroposophical_medicine). [David Stephan](/wiki/David_Stephan)- Speaker at health and wellness expos where he promotes Truehope Nutritional Support supplements. [Andrew Taylor Still](/wiki/Andrew_Taylor_Still)- Founded [osteopathy](/wiki/Osteopathy), a therapy Founded [Ideokinesis](/wiki/Ideokinesis), a form of somatic education, in the 1930s. - Mohammad Ali Taheri - founder of two complementary medicines Faradarmani and Psymentology. U[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=18)] [Mikao Founder of Integrative Medicine Wolfe](/wiki/Darrell_Wolfe)- Founder of The Wolfe Clinic [J. of [Five Elements](/wiki/Wuxing_(Chinese_philosophy))school of 1830s and 40s. [P. [edit](/w/index.php?title=List_of_people_in_alternative_medicine&action=edit§ion=20)] [Yellow Emperor](/wiki/Yellow_Emperor)(Huang Di) - Historically credited as the founder of traditional Chinese medicine.
